explains: n. 行为准则，道德原则；伦理学，道德学
wordGroup: medical ethics 医德；医学伦理学
business ethics 商业道德，经营道德
code of ethics 道德规范（尤指职业的）；道德准则
ethics committee 伦理委员会；道德委员会
codes of ethics 道德标准；伦理准则
legal ethics 法律道德；法的伦理学
morals and ethics 思想道德修养

sentences.en: It is a question of the relation of ethics to economics.
sentences.cn: 这是个道德和经济之间关系的问题。

sentences.en: Personal ethics and professional ethics sometimes conflict.
sentences.cn: 个人道德与职业道德之间有时会相冲突。

sentences.en: Refugee workers said such action was a violation of medical ethics.
sentences.cn: 难民工作者称这种行为违背了医学道德。
